name: Blaspheming Hand
description: The Blaspheming Hand is a Large fiend, characterized by its impressive size and eerie gestures. It has a formidable presence, capable of flying and executing powerful magical effects in combat.
memorable: It has an intriguing Evil Fingers ability that inflicts various detrimental effects on enemies while grappling them.
goals: To control the battlefield and weaken opponents through a combination of grappling and magical attacks.
relations: Often serves alongside other fiends or evil creatures, benefiting from their presence through its Steadfast ability.
environment: Typically found in dark, sinister locations or realms associated with evil.
strengths: Possesses Magic Resistance, making it resistant to many spell effects, and its Evil Fingers ability complicates encounters for adventurers.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to magical weapons and can be overwhelmed if isolated from allies.
attacks: Uses a Claw attack that deals significant slashing damage and can grapple targets, inhibiting their movement.
most_powerful_ability: Evil Fingers allows it to manipulate opponents with various harmful effects, adding strategic value to its attacks.
senses: Has blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to sense its surroundings without relying on sight.
skills: Has moderate perception skills with a +1 modifier.
additional_information: Grants advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects due to its Magic Resistance.
Can restrain Medium or smaller creatures while grappling.
Can pull or push enemies with magical effects, altering their positioning in combat.
Can regain hit points by damaging marked targets through its Unravelling Finger ability.
Operates best in cooperation with other allies to maintain its Steadfast immunity.
